full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Architectural and Engineering Design Services**

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**RFx Number:** WS3892760290

**Publication Date:** April 5, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** May 26, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EDT

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Procurement Category:** Construction Services under the category of Contract Negotiation Services (CNST)

**Project Overview:**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites proposals from qualified architectural and engineering consultants to provide services for the design and construction of RCMP detachments in Provost, Coronation, and Tofield, Alberta.

**Services Required:**

The selected consultant will be responsible for providing services to design and construct:

* One RCMP detachment in Provost
* Two RCMP detachments in Coronation and Tofield (subject to project approval)

**Projec Parameters:**

* Each location will require independent drawings and specifications
* A common design with local influences will be required for the noted locations
* A separate add-alternate price is required for Coronation and Tofield detachments

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The proposals will be evaluated on the basis of the combined rating of technical merit and price. The selection criteria for technical merit include the following:

* Quality of design
* Experience of the consultant team
* Ability to meet project deadlines

**Addendum Information:**

Please note that the closing time for bid submissions has been modified to 2:00 p.m. EDT on May 26, 2023.
